name: eseala
description:
Eseala is a mini adventure game set in an unfixed world. As Eseala, you navigate misty cliffs and forgotten pockets of time, uncovering knowledge of the past, present, and future. As the story unfolds, the truth behind the dark presence and overwhelming memories you encounter is revealed, which leads you to uncover the mysterious and magical workings of the Universe… and your role in it.

Features
  • This is a short graphically and story rich third-person game.
  • Fill your energy to navigate and interact with the world (don’t forget to hold the button down, sometimes actions reset).
  • Unlock switches, push blocks and dodge creatures as you progress through the adventure.
  • Don’t forget to enjoy the beauty and pay close attention to your surroundings.
